nodes.bodyText: I think we don't need this anymore, the code shall hide things automatically.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+-- // CB-7013 Delete old 7.1.1 templates
+-- Migration SQL that makes the change goes here.
+
+UPDATE blueprint SET status = 'DEFAULT_DELETED' WHERE status = 'DEFAULT' AND name LIKE '7.1.1%';

nodes.bodyText: I removed the line and also fixed an issue with the loader service what I just realized. Different commit and different issue but if you want I can open two separated pull request for this.
